page.title: 09THE POLICE
page.content: There is one POLICE STATION in WANTAGE. The WANTAGE POLICE STATION is also the GROVE POLICE STATION.P.C Leafe works at the POLICE STATION.He is Millbrook Schools policeman.P.C.O'Kane is Millbrook Schools policewomen.She also works at the POLICE STATION.The POLICE STATION is fitted with alarms. Like the one at Barcleys Bank.The one at Barcleys Bank is connected to one of the alarms at the POLICE STATION.So that if a robber was robbing Barclays Bank the alarm at the POLICE STATION would go off and the police would catch him in no time.In WANTAGE POLICE STATION there are police cars and police vans.The police have special equipment,they have a C.B,a Truncheon and handcuffs. by Darryl Holinrake & Brian Moore.
